play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: That you and I should meet upon such terms
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: As now we meet. You have deceived our trust,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And made us doff our easy robes of peace,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: To crush our old limbs in ungentle steel:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: This is not well, my lord, this is not well.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: What say you to it? will you again unknit
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: This curlish knot of all-abhorred war?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And move in that obedient orb again
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Where you did give a fair and natural light,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And be no more an exhaled meteor,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: A prodigy of fear and a portent
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Of broached mischief to the unborn times?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Hear me, my liege:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: For mine own part, I could be well content
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: To entertain the lag-end of my life
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: With quiet hours; for I do protest,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: I have not sought the day of this dislike.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: You have not sought it! how comes it, then?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Rebellion lay in his way, and he found it.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Peace, chewet, peace!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: It pleased your majesty to turn your looks
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Of favour from myself and all our house;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And yet I must remember you, my lord,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: We were the first and dearest of your friends.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: For you my staff of office did I break
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: In Richard's time; and posted day and night
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: to meet you on the way, and kiss your hand,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: When yet you were in place and in account
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Nothing so strong and fortunate as I.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: It was myself, my brother and his son,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: That brought you home and boldly did outdare
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: The dangers of the time. You swore to us,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And you did swear that oath at Doncaster,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: That you did nothing purpose 'gainst the state;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Nor claim no further than your new-fall'n right,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: The seat of Gaunt, dukedom of Lancaster:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: To this we swore our aid. But in short space
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: It rain'd down fortune showering on your head;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And such a flood of greatness fell on you,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: What with our help, what with the absent king,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: What with the injuries of a wanton time,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: The seeming sufferances that you had borne,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And the contrarious winds that held the king
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: So long in his unlucky Irish wars
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: That all in England did repute him dead:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And from this swarm of fair advantages
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: You took occasion to be quickly woo'd
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: To gripe the general sway into your hand;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Forget your oath to us at Doncaster;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And being fed by us you used us so
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: As that ungentle hull, the cuckoo's bird,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Useth the sparrow; did oppress our nest;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Grew by our feeding to so great a bulk
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: That even our love durst not come near your sight
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: For fear of swallowing; but with nimble wing
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: We were enforced, for safety sake, to fly
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Out of sight and raise this present head;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Whereby we stand opposed by such means
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: As you yourself have forged against yourself
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: By unkind usage, dangerous countenance,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And violation of all faith and troth
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Sworn to us in your younger enterprise.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: These things indeed you have articulate,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Proclaim'd at market-crosses, read in churches,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: To face the garment of rebellion
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: With some fine colour that may please the eye
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Of fickle changelings and poor discontents,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Which gape and rub the elbow at the news
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Of hurlyburly innovation:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And never yet did insurrection want
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Such water-colours to impaint his cause;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Nor moody beggars, starving for a time
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Of pellmell havoc and confusion.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: In both your armies there is many a soul
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Shall pay full dearly for this encounter,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: If once they join in trial. Tell your nephew,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: The Prince of Wales doth join with all the world
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: In praise of Henry Percy: by my hopes,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: This present enterprise set off his head,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: I do not think a braver gentleman,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: More active-valiant or more valiant-young,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: More daring or more bold, is now alive
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: To grace this latter age with noble deeds.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: For my part, I may speak it to my shame,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: I have a truant been to chivalry;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And so I hear he doth account me too;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Yet this before my father's majesty--
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: I am content that he shall take the odds
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Of his great name and estimation,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And will, to save the blood on either side,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Try fortune with him in a single fight.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And, Prince of Wales, so dare we venture thee,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Albeit considerations infinite
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Do make against it. No, good Worcester, no,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: We love our people well; even those we love
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: That are misled upon your cousin's part;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And, will they take the offer of our grace,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Both he and they and you, every man
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Shall be my friend again and I'll be his:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: So tell your cousin, and bring me word
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: What he will do: but if he will not yield,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Rebuke and dread correction wait on us
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And they shall do their office. So, be gone;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: We will not now be troubled with reply:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: We offer fair; take it advisedly.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: It will not be accepted, on my life:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: The Douglas and the Hotspur both together
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Are confident against the world in arms.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Hence, therefore, every leader to his charge;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: For, on their answer, will we set on them:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: And God befriend us, as our cause is just!
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Hal, if thou see me down in the battle and bestride
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: me, so; 'tis a point of friendship.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Nothing but a colossus can do thee that friendship.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Say thy prayers, and farewell.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: I  would 'twere bed-time, Hal, and all well.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Why, thou owest God a death.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: 'Tis not due yet; I would be loath to pay him before
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: his day. What need I be so forward with him that
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: calls not on me? Well, 'tis no matter; honour pricks
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: me on. Yea, but how if honour prick me off when I
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: come on? how then? Can honour set to a leg? no: or
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: an arm? no: or take away the grief of a wound? no.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Honour hath no skill in surgery, then? no. What is
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: honour? a word. What is in that word honour? what
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: is that honour? air. A trim reckoning! Who hath it?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: he that died o' Wednesday. Doth he feel it? no.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: Doth he hear it? no. 'Tis insensible, then. Yea,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: to the dead. But will it not live with the living?
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: no. Why? detraction will not suffer it. Therefore
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: I'll none of it. Honour is a mere scutcheon: and so
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: ends my catechism.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE I.  KING HENRY IV's camp near Shrewsbury.

line_text: O, no, my nephew must not know, Sir Richard,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: The liberal and kind offer of the king.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: 'Twere best he did.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: Then are we all undone.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: It is not possible, it cannot be,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: The king should keep his word in loving us;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: He will suspect us still and find a time
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: To punish this offence in other faults:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: Suspicion all our lives shall be stuck full of eyes;
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: For treason is but trusted like the fox,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: Who, ne'er so tame, so cherish'd and lock'd up,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: Will have a wild trick of his ancestors.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: Look how we can, or sad or merrily,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: Interpretation will misquote our looks,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: And we shall feed like oxen at a stall,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: The better cherish'd, still the nearer death.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE II.  The rebel camp.

line_text: My nephew's trespass may be well forgot;

play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth

scene_title: SCENE IV.  Another part of the field.

line_text: But mine I am sure thou art, whoe'er thou be,

line_text: And thus I win thee.

scene_title: SCENE IV.  Another part of the field.

scene_title: SCENE IV.  Another part of the field.

scene_title: SCENE IV.  Another part of the field.

scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: The Douglas is; and I beseech your grace
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: I may dispose of him.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: With all my heart.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Then, brother John of Lancaster, to you
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: This honourable bounty shall belong:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Go to the Douglas, and deliver him
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Up to his pleasure, ransomless and free:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: His valour shown upon our crests to-day
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Hath taught us how to cherish such high deeds
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Even in the bosom of our adversaries.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: I thank your grace for this high courtesy,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Which I shall give away immediately.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Then this remains, that we divide our power.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: You, son John, and my cousin Westmoreland
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Towards York shall bend you with your dearest speed,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: To meet Northumberland and the prelate Scroop,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Who, as we hear, are busily in arms:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Myself and you, son Harry, will towards Wales,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: To fight with Glendower and the Earl of March.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Rebellion in this land shall lose his sway,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Meeting the cheque of such another day:
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And since this business so fair is done,
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Let us not leave till all our own be won.
play_title_long: The First Part of Henry the Fourth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.
